item.title: Ubuntu 24.10
item.description: Meet Ubuntu 24.10 that celebrates 20 years of Ubuntu and features Cutting edge kernel and enhanced desktop security today.

item.title: UbuCon Korea 2024
item.description: Following the success of last year’s UbuCon Korea, UbuCon Korea was held at Aug 10th at Microsoft Korea. With the theme “Deploy with Ubuntu”

item.title: Download Ubuntu
item.description: Version and system requirements Ubuntu 24.04 LTS Ubuntu 24.04 LTS, the latest LTS(Long term support) version provides 5 years of maintenance and security updates for free. In most cases, LTS version is recommended for stable use. See Ubuntu 24.04 LTS release notes (Korean translation) See Ubuntu 24.04 LTS release notes Ubuntu 23.10 If you want to try out latest features, Try out Ubuntu 23.10, the latest version. It provides 9 months of maintenance and security updates for free.
